pages.text: O-Cows drop lots of meat, leather, and bones. They also come in over 400 different variants (horns included). Cows can be milked to make cheese. $(br2)O-Cows naturally run from O-Horses, and herd with eachother. You can use this to your advantage to drive up to 8 cattle in a herd with your horse.
The milking cooldown on O-Cows is 10 minutes. However, this is configurable in the livestock-overhaul-common.toml.
O-Cows can come in 7 different breeds: $(br2)Angus, Longhorn, Brahman, Mini, Highland, Watusi and Corriente.

pages.name: The O-Cow
pages.text: A black angus heifer with no markings.
